reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thorpe's lectures are engaging and informative. She really knows how to make complex topics accessible.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Prof. Chen's passion for AI is contagious. His projects are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's research is cutting-edge, but her lectures can be a bit dry. Office hours are helpful though.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez brings history to life with his storytelling. His exams are tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Wong is an excellent teacher. Her lab demonstrations are always exciting and memorable.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Grant seems knowledgeable, but he's often unprepared for class and disorganized.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Patel's field trips are the highlight of her course. She's passionate about conservation.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee knows his stuff, but he can be impatient with students who struggle. His problem sets are intense.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Morales is inspiring! Her classes always lead to thought-provoking discussions on social issues.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Kim's enthusiasm for physics is infectious. His demonstrations make complex concepts clearer.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Foster's analysis of texts is profound. She encourages creative thinking and original interpretations.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson knows his field well, but he tends to dominate discussions. More student participation would be nice.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Nguyen's research is fascinating. Her course is challenging but she's always willing to help outside of class.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Brown's lectures are like guided tours through time. His passion for art is truly inspiring.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's field trips are excellent. She makes rocks and minerals surprisingly interesting!

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Lee is brilliant, but his lectures can be hard to follow. His office hours are very helpful though.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez is an excellent teacher. Her explanations of language structures are clear and fascinating.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Chang brings real-world experience to the classroom. His case studies are particularly insightful.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Schmidt's classes are eye-opening. She challenges students to think critically about culture and society.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Owens leads great discussions. He's skilled at making abstract concepts accessible and relevant.
